hero.title: Scriptagher Bot Library
hero.description: Browse a curated collection of multi-language bots, crafted for immersive and engaging experiences.

intro.title: The Scriptagher automation hub
intro.lead: Discover ready-made bots and installers curated for the community.

automation.title: Automation that fits your workflow
automation.description: Trigger bots for customer support, e-commerce, and more without rewriting your stack.

localization.title: Built for multilingual teams
localization.description: Switch languages instantly with human-reviewed translations so every teammate can stay in sync.

trust.title: Transparent and verifiable
trust.description: Every release ships with checksums, licences, and source links you can audit.

languages.title: Start where you feel at home
languages.description: Popular languages are ready with curated collections to explore.

installers.title: Grab an installer and get started
installers.description: Download signed packages with the essentials for the first run.

installerSection.title: Installers

intro.title: Convert PDFs into text without the fuss
intro.description: Upload your PDF and extract text in seconds. Nothing is sent to remote servers: everything happens directly in your browser.

dropzone.title: Drop your PDF here
dropzone.subtitle: Or click to pick it from your device

status.noText: No text could be extracted from the document.
status.error: We couldn't read the PDF. Make sure it isn't protected and try again later.

fallback.title: No PDF selected
fallback.description: Upload a document to get started. If the tool becomes unavailable, the top bar button will automatically hide to avoid confusion.
